LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDynamite_Westerado.label: dynamite stick
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDynamite_Westerado.descrip: Old-school dynamite stick. They can be thrown a very short distance inaccurately, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby.
LanguageData.Proj_GrenadeDynamite_Westerado.label: dynamite stick
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDynamiteBundle_Westerado.d: Old-school dynamite stick bundle. They can be thrown a very short distance inaccurately, where they'll explode violently, damaging anything and anyone nearby.
